people.name: Rahul Vithanage
people.notes: Manages Google campaigns, conducts A/B tests, provides search impression share insights, coordinates with Google reps, handles PMAX campaigns and TROAS settings

people.name: Ingrid
people.notes: Appears to be in leadership role, receives campaign updates, makes strategic decisions, involved in GMC access and bundle image approvals

people.name: Jourdan
people.notes: Acts as intermediary between CMO and agencies/vendors, responsible for performance reporting, projecting July performance, reviewing TROAS settings, target: 25% MoM/YoY growth with 20% bonus

people.name: Chris Jacob
people.notes: Handles technical aspects including GMC access, works with legacy images, manages TikTok shop compliance issues, tracks Nordstrom sales impact

people.name: Berkeley Clark
people.notes: Frequently cc'd on campaign communications, needs GMC admin access, involved in Hyperrice bundle oversight

people.name: Jake Panzer
people.notes: Works on attribution windows for legacy campaigns, provides creative reports, handles 1DC ROAS analysis

people.name: Jeremy Dranikoff
people.notes: Provides detailed performance reports including TikTok analysis, manages body sculpt funnels, handles creative performance data and traffic campaigns

people.name: Abigale
people.notes: Coordinates team schedules, manages holiday coverage, stays available for urgent issues

people.name: Ari Murray
people.notes: Frequently cc'd on campaign communications and A/B test results

people.name: Sumish Khadka
people.notes: Handles legacy images and promotional materials, works on bundle image updates

people.name: Tori
people.notes: Google rep who provides guidance on PMAX scaling tests, ROAS targets, Demand Gen scaling, and ToF YT Reach/Traffic investments

people.name: Dani
people.notes: Creates and updates bundle images, removes promotional stickers from product images

people.name: Elyse
people.notes: Brief mention requesting team to check something

people.name: Simo
people.notes: Higher-up who requests performance reports, asked for one-pager on first half year performance vs previous year

people.name: CMO
people.notes: Sets high-level growth initiatives and goals (25% MoM/YoY growth), relies on account manager for vendor communication, receives weekly reports every Monday

people.name: Multi-hat CFO
people.notes: Oversees tech, finance, and HR functions, frequently works with account manager, met during onboarding process
